<<<<<<< HEAD
To the honourable Citie of London. The humble petition of Philip Skippon, Esq;
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for William Waterson, London : [1660]
A satire, not in fact by Philip Skippon. -- Cf. Wing. Publication date from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 8. 1659". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
To the honourable Citie of London. The humble petition of Philip Skippon, Esq;
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for William Waterson, London : [1660]
A satire, not in fact by Philip Skippon. -- Cf. Wing. Publication date from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 8. 1659". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
William Waterson
